roleset.name: to revise, renovate

example.name: transitive
example.text: But this year , Honda has revamped the Accord and made it a midsized car .

example.name: inanimate causer
example.text: Congress sent to President Bush an $ 8.5 billion [*U*] military construction bill that cuts spending for new installations by 16 % while [*] revamping the Pentagon budget [*-3] to move more than $ 450 million [*U*] from foreign bases to home-state projects .

roleset.note: REVAMP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revamp' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from revamp.01-v predicate notes)
